item.title: About me
item.author: markus@petzsch.eu (Markus Petzsch)
item.description: Obligatory information / Imprint Georg Markus Petzsch Sandl√ºnz 1 99768 Harztor GERMANY Tel.: +49-160-92857620 Fax: +49-36331-32029 E-Mail: markus@petzsch.eu GPG Key: 0x3498ffa6b3a7537e5f23788e983751bd3aca4995 Keybase: petzsch About me My name is Georg Markus Petzsch. I am a DevOps Engineer at Sternico GmbH. I work on all sorts of awesome projects and want to blog here about some cool technologies that I came across during my work.
